ygData.messageBody:
there is, its 2H, but i dont have a clue on what the stats are or what the
special abilities are.

----------
From: Jeremy <Jeremy@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Swords...
Date: Thursday, April 29, 1999 11:50 PM

I've heard rumors that there are swords for shadow knights kind of like
paladins, that give them special abilities. Can anyone tell me if this is
true and, if so, if it's going to be a 1-handed or 2-handed weapon? If
there is, don't tell me where it is, tho, I want to find that for myself.
